name: GÖÂRGĤ
description:
LudumDare45 Game - GÖÂRGĤ

This is a variation of scroll-shooter where you start with nothing. It means: no weapons, no bonuses, and you can’t even attack. At start you only can move. You should find a weapon or it will be very hot. Good luck!

I hope you enjoy it :) P.S. It was very hard and stressful some essential features are not completed. Only core gameplay. So I need to explain that weapons drops only when enemies collides with you and it has some chance to drop. P.P.S. Dialogs should exlpain it for you, but it didn’t finished. Also like other weapons/enemies and etc…

Thanks to arsher, Music was made by him
